name: Brian Long
description:
Brian Long ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Brian Long in mp3 format. Brother Brian Long is the pastor of Cornerstone Community Church of Barnsdall. God has done a powerful work in this brothers life as he has served as a baptist pastor for a season and now God has called him out to a independent work under the Headship of Jesus Christ.
He has spoken at SermonIndex Conference as well as other revival meetings in Churches across America. His burden and passion for the glory of Jesus Christ alone is evident in his preaching. The emphasis on prayer and the prayer meeting in their fellowship has been the power behind the local church, you are welcome to visit locally for their prayer time on Wednesday.

sermons.title: A Promise Of God's Manifest Presence
sermons.description: Brother Brian shares on the great value and important of the manifest presence of God in the live of the believer and the corporate expression of the gathering of the Church. We are in a great need to covet, desire of God's presence with us and to repent of our sins and lack of desire to have God involved with us as we endeavour to be in His work. 'Working for God without God' is one of the great tragedies of the modern church in North America.

sermons.title: Christ the Omega; Christ the End
sermons.description: Brother Brian speaks of Christ who is the End of all things. The world will pass away, all created things will pass away. The earth will be burned and pass away, the heavens will pass away. Is our heart on this present world? Are we attached to things of the world or is our heart in heaven and eternally minded? Choose Christ now and forsake this passing world.

sermons.title: Men Like Noah in Days Like Noah
sermons.description: Recently Brian preached a message at the â€œLet Us Rise Menâ€™s Conferenceâ€ in Barnsdall, OK. Brian preached a powerful message, one I dare say every man today needs to hear, called, â€œMen Like Noah In Days Like Noah.â€ Brian sounds a clear clarion call for the men of our day to: Wake Up, Get Up, Clean Up, Stand Up, Build Up, Never Give Up, & Look Up.

sermons.title: The Humility Of Christ (Conference Call)
sermons.description: Brian Long shares a powerful message on the Humility of Christ. He reads this message on a prayer revival conference call. Hear afresh the humility of our precious Lord and how this challenges us to follow in His ways. Brian Long is the pastor of Cornerstone Community Church of Barnsdall and can be contacted at: barnsdallcornerstone.com

sermons.title: The Land is in ruins, Weep all ye people!
sermons.description: Brian Long shares passionately the burden of his heart over the sad state of western christianity. He shares from Jeremiah the need for revival and repentance in the church. He shares the warning of judgment but also the great mercy and grace God will show.

sermons.title: What Is Love? The Root of Self-Seeking
sermons.description: Brother Brian shares about the love of God. He defines it Biblically and gives many examples of how much love means to God and each believer. He exhorts us to seek and pursue love above all things. Love is not selfish, he shows clearly that the root of love is not self-seeking. A great challenging message to all of us.
